file_insights.purpose: Directory placeholder file to ensure empty directory is tracked by git
Directory placeholder file to ensure empty directory is tracked by git
Directory placeholder file to ensure empty directory is tracked by git

patterns_discovered.description: Using empty .gitkeep files as a standard convention to preserve empty directory structure in git repositories
Organized debug artifacts into categorized subdirectories (har, logs, screenshots) for better artifact management

approach_outcome.description: Successfully created debug directory structure on first attempt
approach_outcome.efficiency: High - straightforward task with immediate success

recommendations.suggestion: Add a README.md in the debug/ directory explaining the purpose of each subdirectory (har for HTTP archives, logs for application logs, screenshots for UI captures)
Consider adding .gitignore files in each subdirectory to allow tracking of the directory while excluding actual debug artifacts if they contain sensitive or large data
Update project documentation or CONTRIBUTING guidelines to specify how developers should use these debug directories
